title: The Divided man: commitment or compromise
creator_credit: Milosaw Kijawicz, Miniature Film Studio, Film Polski and Stephen Bosustow Productions
brief_description: An animated film which proves the maxim that one cannot travel two roads at the same time without being diminished. Vascillating from side to side, a man struggles to make a decision. In an effort to make the “perfect” choice he divides himself and travels two paths. However when his two halves attempt to reunite one half has shrunk.
